job.title: Senior Software Engineer, Presentation
job.description: emTo get the best candidate experience please consider applying for a maximum of 3 roles within 12 months to ensure you are not duplicating effortsbrbremstrong Job Category strongProducts and Technologystrong Job Details brbrstrongSo youve got an amazing chart that will change the way people think make decisions or do their work But how will you share it with others Will you build a dashboard that people can use to understand and evaluate progress Will you add beautiful animated transitions on your viz to help share your insight in the most compelling narrative Will you tell a beautiful and visually compelling story around your data Or perhaps you will build an applicationlike product that will elevate your consumers insights to a whole new levelbrbrOn the Presentation team we are building these capabilities into Tableau and we need your help to make it happen We design and develop features to allow users to express themselves in exciting new ways giving our customers the flexibility to see and understand their data and tell data stories in the form that works best for them As a part of the this team you will be developing user experiences that drive some of the most visually impactful aspects of TableaubrbrstrongSome of the things youll be doing include brstrongulliBuilding great customerfriendly interfaces that allow people to interact with their data and see it the way that makes sense to them liliCoding in and learning multiple technologies across our highly integrated suite of cloud server and desktop software liliWorking across teams to make sure we are building great experiences for customers that make manipulating analyzing and telling stories with data easier than ever liliCollaborating with a team of toptier software engineers to achieve increasingly high standards of engineering and operational excellence brliulstronguWho You ArebrustrongulliExperienced Extensive experience coding in at least one of the objectoriented languages such as C C or Java Highly Technical You are fluent in commonly used design patterns You can constructively review the work of others to ensure high quality and adherence to best practices You love to write maintainable and understandable quality code You write tests for your code as a way to maintain high quality You have demonstrated the ability to come up to speed quickly on new technologies liliPassionate You love building easy to use and beautiful user interfaces and have a passion for solving complex problems You understand what it takes to write software that is used by thousands even millions of people You love products that just work  that are robust scalable and perform well Innovative You have a history of finding pragmatic solutions to difficult problems You have experience working on ambitious forwardlooking projects Curious You love to get to the root of the problem You debug across code bases and languages to wherever the problem takes you liliTeam Player You enjoy collaborating with learning from and teaching others so we all can become better You assume the good intent in others and do your part to create a positive work environment liliYou are a Recruiter Tableau hires company builders and in this role you will be asked to be on the constant lookout for the best talent to bring onboard to help us continue to build one of the best companies in the worldbrliulstrong Accommodations brbrstrongIf you require assistance due to a disability applying for open positions please submit a request via this Accommodations Request Formbrbrstrong Posting Statement brbrstrongAt Salesforce we believe that the business of business is to improve the state of our world Each of us has a responsibility to drive Equality in our communities and workplaces We are committed to creating a workforce that reflects society through inclusive programs and initiatives such as equal pay employee resource groups inclusive benefits and more Learn more about Equality at Salesforce and explore our benefitsbrbruSalesforcecomu and uSalesforceorgu are Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employers Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex sexual orientation gender perception or identity national origin age marital status protected veteran status or disability status uSalesforcecomu and uSalesforceorgu do not accept unsolicited headhunter and agency resumes uSalesforcecomu and uSalesforceorgu will not pay any thirdparty agency or company that does not have a signed agreement with uSalesforecomu or SalesforceorgbrbrSalesforce welcomes all
